channel.title: REST on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in REST on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Feign ApacheHttp5 Client SSL and Proxy Connection in Spring Boot
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn how to configure a FeignClient with SSL and Proxy Connection using ApacheHttp5 in your Spring Boot project.

item.title: Conditional Annotations in Spring Boot
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll take a look at Conditional Annotations in Spring Boot with examples.

item.title: Spring @Controller and @RestController
item.description: In this quick article, we’ll see @Controller and @RestController annotations and their difference in Spring MVC.

item.title: Configure Feign Client in Spring Boot
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn how to configure a FeignClient in your Spring Boot project to consume RESTFul APIs from other services.

item.title: Build RESTFul API with Spring Boot
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn to build RESTFul APIs in Spring Boot Web Application using layered architecture and test driven development approach.
